casebody.data:
No. 10-5749. John Willis Richard, Petitioner v. David Rock, Superintendent, Upstate Correctional Facility. 562 U.S. 1125, 131 S. Ct. 853,

178 L. Ed. 2d 584,

2010 U.S. LEXIS 9615. December 13, 2010.

Petition for rehearing denied.

Former decision, 562 U.S. 966, 131 S. Ct. 465, 178 L. Ed. 2d 295, 2010 U.S. LEXIS 8005.
